short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to type text using voice

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can type text into any website using your voice! 

This extension, unlike other similar extensions, does not rely on outdated services to provide users with an text to speech solution, but instead uses advanced text to speech which uses AI to not only give you the most accurate results but also automatically sets grammar like punctuation for you.

Languages:

For the time being we only provide support for the English language, but with more users we will expand on language we will offer, so don't hesitate to recommend us to a friend of yours.

For the time being, but only for a short time, this extension will be for free, so take your chance to try it out yourself!
